content:
ITEM NO.1502               COURT NO.7               SECTION IV-A
               S U P R E M E  C O U R T  O F  I N D I A
                       RECORD OF PROCEEDINGS
PETITION(S) FOR SPECIAL LEAVE TO APPEAL (C) NO(S).1970-1971/2023
[ARISING OUT OF IMPUGNED FINAL JUDGMENT AND ORDER DATED  25-05-2022
IN MFA NO. 101253/2019 25-05-2022 IN MFA NO. 101435/2019 PASSED BY
THE HIGH COURT OF KARNATAKA CIRCUIT BENCH AT DHARWAD]
SACHIN YALLAPPA USULKAR & ORS.                        PETITIONER(S)
                                VERSUS
VIJAYATA & ORS.                                       RESPONDENT(S)
(IA NO. 5670/2023 - APPLICATION FOR SUBSTITUTION
IA NO. 5669/2023 - EXEMPTION FROM FILING O.T.)
 
Date: 28-02-2025 This petition is called on for pronouncement of
judgment today.
For Petitioner(s): Mr. Charudatta Vijayrao Mahindrakar, AOR
                   
                   
For Respondent(s): M/S. Krishna  &  Nishani Law Chambers, AOR
                   Mr. Anil C Nishani, Adv.
                   Mr. Krishna M Singh, Adv.
                   Mr. Meenesh Dubey, Adv.
                   Mr. Upendra Thakur, Adv.
                   Mr. Vishwesh R Murnal, Adv.
                 
                   
                   Mr. Aditya Kumar, Adv.
                   Mr. C. George Thomas, AOR
                   Ms. Ila Nath, Adv.
                   
                 
Hon'ble  Mr.  Justice  Satish  Chandra  Sharma  has
pronounced the judgment of the Bench comprising of Hon'ble
Mrs. Justice B.V. Nagarathna and His Lordship.
Leave granted.
1The appeals are partly allowed in terms of the signed
reportable judgment, which is placed on file.
Pending  application(s)  including  substitution
application, if any, shall stand disposed of. 
(B. LAKSHMI MANIKYA VALLI)                      (DIVYA BABBAR)
COURT MASTER (SH)                             COURT MASTER (NSH)
2
